definition: see 可汗[ke4 han2]

sentences.english: Now that objective is no longer tantalizingly out of reach.
sentences.chinese: 现在这个目标不再可望而不可及了。

sentences.english: This woman , Nike Mercurial Vapor Superfly III FG, in his in the mind, really is an inaccessible beautiful woman.
sentences.chinese: 这个女子，在他心里，真的就是可望而不可及的仙子。

definition: in sight but unattainable (idiom)/inaccessible/also written 可望而不可及[ke3 wang4 er2 bu4 ke3 ji2]
pinyin: ke3 wang4 er2 bu4 ke3 ji2

definition: unattainable/far-fetched/out of reach/exceedingly remote or distant
too high to reach (idiom); eminent and unapproachable
to yearn for sth even in one's dreams (idiom)/to long for sth day and night
lit. to see only the other rider's dust and have no hope of catching up (idiom)/to be far inferior
to hope to reach/to strive for
lit. to gaze at the ocean and lament one's inadequacy (idiom)/fig. to feel powerless and incompetent (to perform a task)
to shrink back/to flinch
unreal/illusory/imaginary/vague and with nothing in it
to look up at/to look up to sb hopefully
set up on high (idiom); not in touch with reality/aloof and remote
to dream/to sleep
to yearn for/to look forward to
easily obtained/readily available
lit. not eating the food of common mortals/fig. placing oneself above the common populace
pinyin: bu4 shi2 ren2 jian1 yan1 huo3

definition: common people/ordinary folk
